sourcesContent: import React, { FC } from 'react' import { Pane, Heading, Paragraph, Button, majorScale } from 'evergreen-ui' import Link from 'next/link' const PostPreview: FC<{ post: { title: string; summary: string; slug: string } }> = ({ post }) => { return ( {post.title} {post.summary} ) } export default PostPreview
